83bbfb97-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: This variable identifies the thickness of a prescribed ice sheet. This information is relevant to better understand how different models treat ice. For models where an ice sheet is just orography + an ice sheet mask, the value should be set to zero. For models that explicitly resolve an ice sheet thickness, the thickness of the ice sheet should be provided.

d228925a-4a9f-11e6-b84e-ac72891c3257.long_name: Liquid Water Content of Snow Layer

bab0f1a2-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Liquid Water Content of Snow Layer
bab0f1a2-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: where land over land: this is computed as the total mass of liquid water contained interstitially within the snow layer of the land portion of a grid cell divided by the area of the land portion of the cell.

d5b43544-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: The Cell Area of the Ice Sheet Model
d5b43544-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: When interpolated to a regular grid, it should be interpolated (not summed) with a conservative scheme to preserve total area

d5b39e54-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: The Cell Area of the Ice Sheet Model
d5b39e54-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: When interpolated to a regular grid, it should be interpolated (not summed) with a conservative scheme to preserve total area

bab1688a-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: the mass (summed over all all layers) of frozen water.

132b3a2e-be44-11e6-9e13-f9e3356200b3.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

d5b32a1e-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: Runoff flux over land ice is the difference between any available liquid water in the snowpack less any refreezing. Computed as the sum of rainfall and melt of snow or ice less any refreezing or water retained in the snowpack

d5b2b2dc-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: Runoff flux over land ice is the difference between any available liquid water in the snowpack less any refreezing. Computed as the sum of rainfall and melt of snow or ice less any refreezing or water retained in the snowpack

81210f1c-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

d228ee4e-4a9f-11e6-b84e-ac72891c3257.long_name: Liquid Water Content of Permafrost Layer

bab323d2-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Liquid Water Content of Permafrost Layer
bab323d2-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: "where land over land", i.e., this is the total mass of liquid water contained within the permafrost layer within the land portion of a grid cell divided by the area of the land portion of the cell.

8120d9de-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

8120d4f2-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

81212830-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

81212d26-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.long_name: Ice Sheet Surface Upwelling Longwave Radiation
81212d26-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

81211d54-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.long_name: Ice Sheet Surface Downwelling Shortwave Radiation
81211d54-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

81212218-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.long_name: Ice Sheet Surface Upwelling Shortwave Radiation
81212218-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

d5b31722-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Surface Snow and Ice Sublimation Flux
d5b31722-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: The snow and ice sublimation flux is the loss of snow and ice mass per unit area from the surface resulting from their direct conversion to water vapor that enters the atmosphere.

132b2aca-be44-11e6-9e13-f9e3356200b3.long_name: Ice Sheet Surface Snow and Ice Sublimation Flux
132b2aca-be44-11e6-9e13-f9e3356200b3.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

d5b2a0a8-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Surface Snow and Ice Sublimation Flux
d5b2a0a8-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: The snow and ice sublimation flux is the loss of snow and ice mass per unit area from the surface resulting from their direct conversion to water vapor that enters the atmosphere.

bab6bba0-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Surface Snow and Ice Sublimation Flux
bab6bba0-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: The snow and ice sublimation flux is the loss of snow and ice mass resulting from their conversion to water vapor.  Computed as the total sublimation on the land portion of the grid cell divided by the land area in the grid cell; reported as missing for snow-free land regions; reported as missing where the land fraction is 0.

d2282ebe-4a9f-11e6-b84e-ac72891c3257.long_name: Surface Snow and Ice Sublimation Flux
d2282ebe-4a9f-11e6-b84e-ac72891c3257.description: surface upward flux of water vapor due to sublimation of surface snow and ice

bab6b948-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Surface Snow and Ice Sublimation Flux
bab6b948-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: The snow and ice sublimation flux is the loss of snow and ice mass from the surface resulting from their conversion to water vapor that enters the atmosphere.

80082b5a-f906-11e6-a176-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Surface Snow and Ice Sublimation Flux
80082b5a-f906-11e6-a176-5404a60d96b5.description: The snow and ice sublimation flux is the loss of snow and ice mass from the surface resulting from their conversion to water vapor that enters the atmosphere.

8bbb1a70-4a5b-11e6-9cd2-ac72891c3257.description: Percentage of grid cell covered by floating ice shelf, the component of the ice sheet that is flowing over sea water

d5b46780-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: This is needed in case the floating ice sheet area changes in time (NO grounded ice sheet)

d5b3d068-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: This is needed in case the floating ice sheet area changes in time (NO grounded ice sheet)

b7f3360a-7c00-11e6-bcdf-ac72891c3257.description: This is needed to distinguish between grounded glaciated ice (grounded = ice sheet and glacier) and ice shelves (floating over sea water), since land\_ice is by definition ice sheet, glacier and ice shelves

8bbb1520-4a5b-11e6-9cd2-ac72891c3257.description: Percentage of grid cell covered by grounded ice sheet

d5b463c0-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: This is needed in case the grounded ice sheet area changes in time (NO floating ice shelf)

d5b3cca8-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: This is needed in case the grounded ice sheet area changes in time (NO floating ice shelf)

b7f330ce-7c00-11e6-bcdf-ac72891c3257.description: This is needed to distinguish between grounded glaciated ice (grounded = ice sheet and glacier) and ice shelves (floating over sea water), since land\_ice is by definition ice sheet, glacier and ice shelves

d5b35b06-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: quantity averaged over ice sheet (grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

132b3e66-be44-11e6-9e13-f9e3356200b3.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

d5b2e306-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: quantity averaged over ice sheet (grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

d5b45c2c-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: quantity averaged over ice sheet  only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

d5b3c500-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: quantity averaged over ice sheet  only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

bab7c75c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Percentage of each grid cell that is occupied by snow that rests on land portion of cell.

bab7c2d4-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Fraction of each grid cell that is occupied by snow that rests on land portion of cell.

b7ccdf0a-7c00-11e6-bcdf-ac72891c3257.description: where land over land, this is computed as the mean thickness of snow in the land portion of the grid cell (averaging over the entire land portion, including the snow-free fraction).  Reported as 0.0 where the land fraction is 0.

bab7e05c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: where land over land, this is computed as the mean thickness of snow in the land portion of the grid cell (averaging over the entire land portion, including the snow-free fraction).  Reported as missing where the land fraction is 0.

d5b31b3c-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Surface Snow and Ice Melt Flux
d5b31b3c-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: Loss of snow and ice mass resulting from surface melting. Computed as the total surface melt on the land ice portion of the grid cell divided by land ice area in the grid cell.

8120e3a2-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.long_name: Ice Sheet Surface Snow and Ice Melt Flux
8120e3a2-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

d5b2a454-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Surface Snow and Ice Melt Flux
d5b2a454-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: Loss of snow and ice mass resulting from surface melting. Computed as the total surface melt on the land ice portion of the grid cell divided by land ice area in the grid cell.

d5b31f56-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: The total surface snow melt rate on the land portion of the grid cell divided by the land area in the grid cell; report as zero for snow-free land regions and missing where there is no land.

132b316e-be44-11e6-9e13-f9e3356200b3.description: Loss of snow mass resulting from surface melting. Computed as the surface melt water from snow on the ice sheet portion of the grid cell divided by the ice\_sheet area in the grid cell; report as 0.0 for snow-free land\_ice regions; report as missing where the land fraction is 0.

d5b2a7f6-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: The total surface snow melt rate on the land portion of the grid cell divided by the land area in the grid cell; report as zero for snow-free land regions and missing where there is no land.

bab802f8-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Computed as the total surface melt water on the land portion of the grid cell divided by the land area in the grid cell; report as 0.0 for snow-free land regions; report as missing where the land fraction is 0.

d5b32686-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Surface Snow and Ice Refreeze Flux
d5b32686-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: Mass flux of surface meltwater which refreezes within the snowpack. Computed as the total refreezing on the land ice portion of the grid cell divided by land ice area in the grid cell.

8120f248-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.long_name: Ice Sheet Surface Snow and Ice Refreeze Flux
8120f248-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

d5b2af3a-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Surface Snow and Ice Refreeze Flux
d5b2af3a-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: Mass flux of surface meltwater which refreezes within the snowpack. Computed as the total refreezing on the land ice portion of the grid cell divided by land ice area in the grid cell.

bab820b2-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: the mass of surface snow on the land portion of the grid cell divided by the land area in the grid cell; reported as missing where the land fraction is 0; excludes snow on vegetation canopy or on sea ice.

bab81e50-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Computed as the mass of surface snow on the land portion of the grid cell divided by the land area in the grid cell; reported as missing where the land fraction is 0; excluded is snow on vegetation canopy or on sea ice.

bab83fc0-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: the entire land portion of the grid cell is considered, with snow soot content set to 0.0 in regions free of snow.

d5b4895e-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: Magnitude of basal drag at land ice base

d5b3f192-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: Magnitude of basal drag at land ice base

8120b9f4-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

d5b43954-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: This is needed in case bed rock elevation changes in time

d5b3a232-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: This is needed in case bed rock elevation changes in time

d5b378fc-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: The bedrock topography beneath the land ice

d5b366a0-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: The bedrock topography beneath the land ice

baba8cbc-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: where land over land: This is the mean thickness of the permafrost layer in the land portion of the grid cell.  Reported as missing in permafrost-free regions.

8120c020-bf17-11e6-b0d8-ac72891c3257.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

d5b2fb8e-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: quantity averaged over ice sheet (grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only. Needed to analyse the impact of downscaling methods

132b199a-be44-11e6-9e13-f9e3356200b3.description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

d5b2853c-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: quantity averaged over ice sheet (grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only. Needed to analyse the impact of downscaling methods

d227e53a-4a9f-11e6-b84e-ac72891c3257.description: This temperature is averaged over all the snow in the grid cell that rests on land or land ice.  When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the mass of snow on the land portion of the grid cell, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.   Reported as "missing in regions free of snow on land.

8bbac66a-4a5b-11e6-9cd2-ac72891c3257.description: This temperature is averaged over all the snow in the grid cell that rests on land or land ice.  When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the mass of snow on the land portion of the grid cell, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.   Reported as "missing in regions free of snow on land.

d5b4763a-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: X-Component of Land Ice Basal Velocity
d5b4763a-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: A velocity is a vector quantity. "x" indicates a vector component along the grid x-axis, positive with increasing x. "Land ice" means glaciers, ice-caps and ice-sheets resting on bedrock and also includes ice-shelves. "basal" means the lower boundary of the land ice.

d5b3df36-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: X-Component of Land Ice Basal Velocity
d5b3df36-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: A velocity is a vector quantity. "x" indicates a vector component along the grid x-axis, positive with increasing x. "Land ice" means glaciers, ice-caps and ice-sheets resting on bedrock and also includes ice-shelves. "basal" means the lower boundary of the land ice.

d5b48206-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: X-Component of Land Ice Vertical Mean Velocity
d5b48206-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: The vertical mean land ice velocity is the average from the bedrock to the surface of the ice

d5b3ea3a-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: X-Component of Land Ice Vertical Mean Velocity
d5b3ea3a-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: The vertical mean land ice velocity is the average from the bedrock to the surface of the ice

d5b46b36-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: X-Component of Land Ice Surface Velocity
d5b46b36-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: A velocity is a vector quantity. "x" indicates a vector component along the grid x-axis, positive with increasing x. "Land ice" means glaciers, ice-caps and ice-sheets resting on bedrock and also includes ice-shelves. The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere.

d5b3d428-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: X-Component of Land Ice Surface Velocity
d5b3d428-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: A velocity is a vector quantity. "x" indicates a vector component along the grid x-axis, positive with increasing x. "Land ice" means glaciers, ice-caps and ice-sheets resting on bedrock and also includes ice-shelves. The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere.

d5b479e6-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Y-Component of Land Ice Basal Velocity
d5b479e6-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: A velocity is a vector quantity. "y" indicates a vector component along the grid y-axis, positive with increasing y. "Land ice" means glaciers, ice-caps and ice-sheets resting on bedrock and also includes ice-shelves. "basal" means the lower boundary of the land ice.

d5b3e2e2-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Y-Component of Land Ice Basal Velocity
d5b3e2e2-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: A velocity is a vector quantity. "y" indicates a vector component along the grid y-axis, positive with increasing y. "Land ice" means glaciers, ice-caps and ice-sheets resting on bedrock and also includes ice-shelves. "basal" means the lower boundary of the land ice.

d5b485b2-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Y-Component of Land Ice Vertical Mean Velocity
d5b485b2-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: The vertical mean land ice velocity is the average from the bedrock to the surface of the ice

d5b3ede6-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Y-Component of Land Ice Vertical Mean Velocity
d5b3ede6-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: The vertical mean land ice velocity is the average from the bedrock to the surface of the ice

d5b46ee2-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Y-Component of Land Ice Surface Velocity
d5b46ee2-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: A velocity is a vector quantity. "y" indicates a vector component along the grid y-axis, positive with increasing y. "Land ice" means glaciers, ice-caps and ice-sheets resting on bedrock and also includes ice-shelves. The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere.'

d5b3d7de-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Y-Component of Land Ice Surface Velocity
d5b3d7de-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: A velocity is a vector quantity. "y" indicates a vector component along the grid y-axis, positive with increasing y. "Land ice" means glaciers, ice-caps and ice-sheets resting on bedrock and also includes ice-shelves. The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere.'

d5b47e5a-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Upward Component of Land-Ice Basal Velocity
d5b47e5a-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: A velocity is a vector quantity. "Upward" indicates a vector component which is positive when directed upward (negative downward). "basal" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere

d5b3e68e-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Upward Component of Land-Ice Basal Velocity
d5b3e68e-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: A velocity is a vector quantity. "Upward" indicates a vector component which is positive when directed upward (negative downward). "basal" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere

d5b4728e-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Upward Component of Land-Ice Surface Velocity
d5b4728e-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: A velocity is a vector quantity. "Upward" indicates a vector component which is positive when directed upward (negative downward). The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere

d5b3db8a-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Upward Component of Land-Ice Surface Velocity
d5b3db8a-c78d-11e6-9b25-5404a60d96b5.description: A velocity is a vector quantity. "Upward" indicates a vector component which is positive when directed upward (negative downward). The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere

80ab72a5-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.long_name: Integral wrt depth of sea water absolute salinity expressed as salt mass content
80ab72a5-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: This is a fundamental aspect of the changes in the hydrological cycle and their impact on the oceans, and due to new numerical schemes and vertical discretizations, it is important to calculate it consistently with the model formulation.

baa56de6-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Sea Water Age Since Surface Contact
baa56de6-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Time elapsed since water was last in surface layer of the ocean.

baa3ee94-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Cell areas for any grid used to report ocean variables and variables which are requested as used on the model ocean grid (e.g. hfsso, which is a downward heat flux from the atmosphere interpolated onto the ocean grid). These cell areas should be defined to enable exact calculation of global integrals (e.g., of vertical fluxes of energy at the surface and top of the atmosphere).

baa3f718-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: A variable with the standard name of region contains strings which indicate geographical regions. These strings must be chosen from the standard region list.

baa52994-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Global Average Sea Water Conservative Temperature
baa52994-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Diagnostic should be contributed only for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.

134c7db2-1026-11e8-9d87-1c4d70487308.description: Diagnostic should be contributed only for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.

baa5255c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Diagnostic should be contributed only for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.

823b4d1e-9159-11ef-949c-b9e189121872.description: Diagnostic should be contributed even for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.

80ab72a2-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.long_name: integral wrt depth of sea water conservative temperature expressed as heat content
80ab72a2-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: This is the vertically-integrated heat content derived from conservative temperature (bigthetao).

baa3e4d0-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Ocean bathymetry. Reported here is the sea floor depth for present day relative to z=0 geoid. Reported as missing for land grid cells.

baa4e8ee-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Lateral biharmonic viscosity applied to the momentum equations.

baa4e4a2-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Lateral Laplacian viscosity applied to the momentum equations.

baa4d82c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Ocean Tracer Diffusivity Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection
baa4d82c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Ocean tracer diffusivity associated with parameterized eddy-induced advective transport. Sometimes this diffusivity is called the "thickness" diffusivity. For CMIP5, this diagnostic was called "ocean tracer bolus laplacian diffusivity".  The CMIP6 name is physically more relevant.

baa4dc50-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Ocean tracer diffusivity associated with parameterized eddy-induced diffusive transport oriented along neutral or isopycnal directions. Sometimes this diffusivity is called the neutral diffusivity or isopycnal diffusivity or Redi diffusivity.

baa4ac8a-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Vertical/dianeutral diffusivity applied to prognostic temperature field.

baa4b0b8-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Vertical/dianeutral diffusivity applied to prognostic salinity field.

baa4ed3a-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Ocean Kinetic Energy Dissipation per Unit Area Due to XY Friction
baa4ed3a-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Depth integrated impacts on kinetic energy arising from lateral frictional dissipation associated with Laplacian and/or biharmonic viscosity. For CMIP5, this diagnostic was 3d, whereas the CMIP6 depth integrated diagnostic is sufficient for many purposes and reduces archive requirements.

83bbfb67-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Cell Length in the X Direction at t-points
83bbfb67-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: The linear extent of the cell in the x direction of the horizontal grid centered at t-points (points for tracers such as temperature, salinity, etc.). Not applicable to unstructured grids.

83bbfb66-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Cell Length in the X Direction at u-points
83bbfb66-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: The linear extent of the cell in the x direction of the horizontal grid centered at u-points (points for velocity in the x-direction). Not applicable to unstructured grids.

83bbfb65-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Cell Length in the X Direction at v-points
83bbfb65-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: The linear extent of the cell in the x direction of the horizontal grid centered at v-points (points for velocity in the y-direction). Not applicable to unstructured grids.

83bbfb64-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Cell Length in the Y Direction at t-points
83bbfb64-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: The linear extent of the cell in the y direction of the horizontal grid centered at t-points (points for tracers such as temperature, salinity, etc.). Not applicable to unstructured grids.

83bbfb63-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Cell Length in the Y Direction at u-points
83bbfb63-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: The linear extent of the cell in the y direction of the horizontal grid centered at u-points (points for velocity in the x-direction). Not applicable to unstructured grids.

83bbfb62-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Cell Length in the Y Direction at v-points
83bbfb62-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: The linear extent of the cell in the y direction of the horizontal grid centered at v-points (points for velocity in the y-direction). Not applicable to unstructured grids.

baa6204c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Water Evaporation Flux Where Ice Free Ocean over Sea
baa6204c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: computed as the total mass of water vapor evaporating from the ice-free portion of the ocean  divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.

83bbfc6a-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Water Flux into Sea Water from Icebergs
83bbfc6a-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: Computed as the iceberg melt water flux into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.

baa628c6-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Water Flux into Sea Water from Icebergs
baa628c6-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: computed as the iceberg melt water  flux into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.

baa62cea-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Water Flux into Sea Water from Icebergs
baa62cea-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: computed as the iceberg melt water flux into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.

83bbfc69-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Water Flux into Sea Water from Land Ice
83bbfc69-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: Computed as the water flux into the ocean due to land ice (runoff water from surface and base of land ice or melt from base of ice shelf or vertical ice front) into the ocean divided by the area ocean portion of the grid cell.

d2234af2-4a9f-11e6-b84e-ac72891c3257.long_name: Water Flux into Sea Water from Land Ice
d2234af2-4a9f-11e6-b84e-ac72891c3257.description: Computed as the water flux into the ocean due to land ice (runoff water from surface and base of land ice or melt from base of ice shelf or vertical ice front) into the ocean divided by the area ocean portion of the grid cell

83bbfc68-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Water Flux into Sea Water from Rivers
83bbfc68-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: Computed as the river flux of water into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.

baa6247a-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Water Flux into Sea Water from Rivers
baa6247a-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: computed as the river flux of water into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.

80ab7446-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Depth-integrated total heat transport from resolved and parameterized processes across different lines on the Earth's surface (based on appendix J and table J1 of Griffies et al., 2016). Formally, this means the integral along the line of the normal component of the heat transport. Positive and negative numbers refer to total northward/eastward and southward/westward transports, respectively. The transport should be evaluated for the full depth of the ocean, except for the Pacific Equatorial Undercurrent, which is averaged from the surface to 350m. Use Celsius for temperature scale.

baa5c87c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Contains contributions from all physical processes affecting the northward heat transport, including resolved advection, parameterized advection, lateral diffusion, etc. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.   Use Celsius for temperature scale.

baa5d952-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Parameterized Eddy Advection
baa5d952-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Contributions to heat transport from parameterized eddy-induced advective transport due to any subgrid advective process. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.  Use Celsius for temperature scale.

baa5ccb4-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection
baa5ccb4-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Contributions to heat transport from parameterized mesoscale eddy-induced advective transport. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.  Use Celsius for temperature scale.

baa5d0ec-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Diffusion
baa5d0ec-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Contributions to heat transport from parameterized mesoscale eddy-induced diffusive transport (i.e., neutral diffusion). Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.

baa5d524-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Parameterized Submesoscale Advection
baa5d524-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Contributions to heat transport from parameterized mesoscale eddy-induced advective transport. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.  Use Celsius for temperature scale.

83bbfc67-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Downward Heat Flux at Sea Water Surface
83bbfc67-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: Net flux of heat entering the liquid water column through its upper surface (excluding any 'flux adjustment').

80ac318d-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.long_name: Downward Heat Flux at Sea Water Surface
80ac318d-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: This is the net flux of heat entering the liquid water column through its upper surface (excluding any "flux adjustment") .

baa6c33a-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Downward Heat Flux at Sea Water Surface
baa6c33a-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: This is the net flux of heat entering the liquid water column through its upper surface (excluding any "flux adjustment") .

baa67b8c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Temperature Flux Due to Evaporation Expressed as Heat Flux out of Sea Water
baa67b8c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: This is defined as "where ice\_free\_sea over sea"

baa67344-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Upward Geothermal Heat Flux at Sea Floor
baa67344-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Upward geothermal heat flux per unit area on the sea floor

baa3fb50-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Upward Geothermal Heat Flux at Sea Floor
baa3fb50-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Upward geothermal heat flux per unit area on the sea floor

baa6a18e-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Heat Flux into Sea Water Due to Iceberg Thermodynamics
baa6a18e-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Heat Flux into Sea Water Due to Iceberg Thermodynamics

baa6a5bc-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Heat Flux into Sea Water Due to Iceberg Thermodynamics
baa6a5bc-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Heat Flux into Sea Water Due to Iceberg Thermodynamics

baa67768-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Temperature Flux Due to Rainfall Expressed as Heat Flux into Sea Water
baa67768-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: This is defined as "where ice\_free\_sea over sea"; i.e., the total flux (considered here) entering the ice-free portion of the grid cell divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.  All such heat fluxes are computed based on Celsius scale.

83bbfc66-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Temperature Flux Due to Runoff Expressed as Heat Flux into Sea Water
83bbfc66-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: Heat flux associated with liquid water which drains from land. It is calculated relative to the heat that would be transported by runoff water entering the sea at zero degrees Celsius.

baa68000-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Temperature Flux Due to Runoff Expressed as Heat Flux into Sea Water
baa68000-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Heat flux associated with liquid water which drains from land. It is calculated relative to the heat that would be transported by runoff water entering the sea at zero degrees Celsius.

baa6842e-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Temperature Flux Due to Runoff Expressed as Heat Flux into Sea Water
baa6842e-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Heat flux associated with liquid water which drains from land. It is calculated relative to the heat that would be transported by runoff water entering the sea at zero degrees Celsius.

baa68852-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Heat Flux into Sea Water Due to Snow Thermodynamics
baa68852-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.  The specification of a physical process by the phrase due\_to\_process means that the quantity named is a  single term in a sum of terms which together compose the general quantity  named by omitting the phrase.  "Snow thermodynamics" refers to the addition or subtraction of mass due to surface and basal fluxes, i.e., due to melting, sublimation and fusion.

baa68c80-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Heat Flux into Sea Water Due to Snow Thermodynamics
baa68c80-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.  The specification of a physical process by the phrase due\_to\_process means that the quantity named is a  single term in a sum of terms which together compose the general quantity  named by omitting the phrase.  "Snow thermodynamics" refers to the addition or subtraction of mass due to surface and basal fluxes, i.e., due to melting, sublimation and fusion.

83bbfb51-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: Contains all contributions to 'x-ward' heat transport from resolved and parameterized processes. Use Celsius for temperature scale

83bbfb89-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: Ocean heat x transport vertically integrated over the whole ocean depth. Contains all contributions to 'x-ward' heat transport from resolved and parameterized processes. Use Celsius for temperature scale. Report on native horizontal grid.

baa5e2e4-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Ocean heat x transport vertically integrated over the whole ocean depth. Contains all contributions to 'x-ward' heat transport from resolved and parameterized processes. Use Celsius for temperature scale. Report on native horizontal grid.

83bbfb50-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: Contains all contributions to 'y-ward' heat transport from resolved and parameterized processes. Use Celsius for temperature scale.

83bbfb88-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: Ocean heat y transport vertically integrated over the whole ocean depth. Contains all contributions to 'y-ward' heat transport from resolved and parameterized processes. Use Celsius for temperature scale. Report on native horizontal grid.

baa5e758-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Ocean heat y transport vertically integrated over the whole ocean depth. Contains all contributions to 'y-ward' heat transport from resolved and parameterized processes. Use Celsius for temperature scale. Report on native horizontal grid.

baa5ef8c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Gyre
baa5ef8c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

baa5f3ba-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Overturning
baa5f3ba-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

8872d1a8-1027-11e8-9d87-1c4d70487308.description: For Boussinesq models, report this diagnostic as Boussinesq reference density times grid celll volume.

baa5147c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: For Boussinesq models, report this diagnostic as Boussinesq reference density times grid celll volume.

baa3ea2a-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tracer grid-cell mass per unit area used for computing tracer budgets. For Boussinesq models with static ocean grid cell thickness, masscello = rhozero\*thickcello, where thickcello is static cell thickness and rhozero is constant Boussinesq reference density. More generally, masscello is time dependent and reported as part of Omon.

4794f818-bb0b-11e6-8316-5980f7b176d1.description: Total mass of liquid sea water. For Boussinesq models, report this diagnostic as Boussinesq reference density times total volume.

baa4f730-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Total mass of liquid sea water. For Boussinesq models, report this diagnostic as Boussinesq reference density times total volume.

baa60bf2-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Transport across\_line means that which crosses a particular line on the Earth's surface (based on appendix J and table J1 of Griffies et al, 2016 (<https://doi.org/10.5194/gmd-9-3231-2016>). Formally this means the integral along the line of the normal component of the transport. The transport should be evaluated for the full depth of the ocean, except for the Pacific Equatorial Undercurrent, which is averaged from the surface to 350m.

8168b848-f906-11e6-a176-5404a60d96b5.long_name: Ocean Mixed Layer Thickness Defined by Sigma T of 0.03 kg m-3
8168b848-f906-11e6-a176-5404a60d96b5.description: Sigma T is potential density referenced to ocean surface. Defined by Sigma T of 0.03 kg m-3 wrt to model level closest to 10 m depth.

80ac31a0-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.long_name: Ocean Mixed Layer Thickness Defined by Sigma T of 0.03 kg m-3
80ac31a0-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Sigma T is potential density referenced to ocean surface. Defined by Sigma T of 0.03 kg m-3 wrt to model level closest to 10 m depth.

baa57688-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Ocean Mixed Layer Thickness Defined by Sigma T of 0.03 kg m-3
baa57688-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Sigma T is potential density referenced to ocean surface. Defined by Sigma T of 0.03 kg m-3 wrt to model level closest to 10 m depth.

1aab3e76-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.long_name: Maximum Ocean Mixed Layer Thickness Defined by Sigma T
1aab3e76-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.description: Sigma T is potential density referenced to ocean surface. Defined by Sigma T of 0.03 kg m-3 wrt to model level closest to 10 m depth.

1aab4e7a-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.long_name: Minimum Ocean Mixed Layer Thickness Defined by Sigma T
1aab4e7a-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.description: Sigma T is potential density referenced to ocean surface. Defined by Sigma T of 0.03 kg m-3 wrt to model level closest to 10 m depth.

baa57ac0-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Square of Ocean Mixed Layer Thickness Defined by Sigma T
baa57ac0-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Sigma T is potential density referenced to ocean surface. The phrase "square\_of\_X" means X\*X. The ocean mixed layer is the upper part of the ocean, regarded as being well-mixed. The base of the mixed layer defined by "temperature", "sigma", "sigma\_theta", "sigma\_t" or vertical diffusivity is the level at which the quantity indicated differs from its surface value by a certain amount. A coordinate variable or scalar coordinate variable with standard name sea\_water\_sigma\_t\_difference can be used to specify the sigma\_t criterion that determines the layer thickness. Sigma-t of sea water is the density of water at atmospheric pressure (i.e. the surface) having the same temperature and salinity, minus 1000 kg m-3. "Thickness" means the vertical extent of a layer.

80ab7419-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Average wave period (i.e., time in-between two wave crests) across the entire two-dimensional wave spectrum, incorporating both wind-sea and swell waves. In spectral wind wave models, it is calculated using spectral moments, mathematical measures that describe the shape and characteristics of the wave spectrum.

80ab744a-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Average wave period (i.e., time in-between two wave crests) across the entire two-dimensional wave spectrum, incorporating both wind-sea and swell waves. In spectral wind wave models, it is calculated using spectral moments, mathematical measures that describe the shape and characteristics of the wave spectrum.

80ab7425-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Average wave period (i.e., time in-between two wave crests) of swell waves only (i.e., waves that have propagated away from their generation area). In spectral wind wave models, it is calculated using spectral moments, mathematical measures that describe the shape and characteristics of the wave spectrum.

80ab741c-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Average wave period (i.e., time in-between two wave crests) of swell waves only (i.e., waves that have propagated away from their generation area). In spectral wind wave models, it is calculated using spectral moments, mathematical measures that describe the shape and characteristics of the wave spectrum.

80ab743d-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Average wave period (i.e., time in-between two wave crests) of wind-sea waves only (i.e., local wind waves). In spectral wind wave models, it is calculated using spectral moments, mathematical measures that describe the shape and characteristics of the wave spectrum.

80ab7424-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Average wave period (i.e., time in-between two wave crests) of wind-sea waves only (i.e., local wind waves). In spectral wind wave models, it is calculated using spectral moments, mathematical measures that describe the shape and characteristics of the wave spectrum.

baa57250-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Streamfunction or its approximation for free surface models. See OMDP document for details.

baa59d48-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Overturning mass streamfunction arising from all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

baa5a1da-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Overturning mass streamfunction arising from all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

baa5af36-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Ocean Meridional Overturning Mass Streamfunction Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection
baa5af36-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: CMIP5 called this "due to Bolus Advection".  Name change respects the more general physics of the mesoscale parameterizations.

baa5b364-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Ocean Meridional Overturning Mass Streamfunction Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection
baa5b364-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: CMIP5 called this "due to Bolus Advection".  Name change respects the more general physics of the mesoscale parameterizations.

baa5c020-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Ocean Meridional Overturning Mass Streamfunction Due to Parameterized Submesoscale Advection
baa5c020-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Report only if there is a submesoscale eddy parameterization.

baa5a662-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Overturning mass streamfunction arising from all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

baa5aafe-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Overturning mass streamfunction arising from all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

baa5b79c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Ocean Y Overturning Mass Streamfunction Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection
baa5b79c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: CMIP5 called this "due to Bolus Advection".  Name change respects the more general physics of the mesoscale parameterizations.

baa5bbe8-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Ocean Y Overturning Mass Streamfunction Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection
baa5bbe8-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: CMIP5 called this "due to Bolus Advection".  Name change respects the more general physics of the mesoscale parameterizations.

1aab5d20-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.long_name: Square of Brunt Vaisala Frequency in Sea Water
1aab5d20-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.description: The phrase "square\_of\_X" means X\*X. Frequency is the number of oscillations of a wave per unit time. Brunt-Vaisala frequency is also sometimes called "buoyancy frequency" and is a measure of the vertical stratification of the medium.

baa46770-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Conservative Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Dianeutral Mixing
baa46770-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized dianeutral mixing. Reported only for models that use conservative temperature as prognostic field.

1aaf3ea4-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.long_name: Depth Integral of Product of Sea Water Density and Conservative Temperature
1aaf3ea4-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.description: Full column sum of density\*cell thickness\*conservative temperature. If the model is Boussinesq, then use Boussinesq reference density for the density factor.

baa4569a-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Conservative Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Eddy Advection
baa4569a-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized eddy advection (all forms of eddy advection). Reported only for models that use conservative temperature as prognostic field.

baa45f14-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Conservative Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Diffusion
baa45f14-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized mesoscale eddy diffusion. Reported only for models that use conservative temperature as prognostic field.

baa46342-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Conservative Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Submesoscale Advection
baa46342-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized submesoscale eddy advection. Reported only for models that use conservative temperature as prognostic field.

1aafb96a-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Conservative Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Residual Mean Advection
1aafb96a-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from residual mean  (sum of Eulerian mean + parameterized eddy-induced) advection. Reported only for models that use conservative temperature as prognostic field.

baa44e34-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Conservative Temperature Expressed as Heat Content
baa44e34-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from all processes. Reported only for models that use conservative temperature as prognostic field.

baa4461e-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Potential Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Dianeutral Mixing
baa4461e-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized dianeutral mixing. Reported only for models that use potential temperature as prognostic field.

1aaf2e6e-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.long_name: Integral with Respect to Depth of Product of Sea Water Density and Potential Temperature
1aaf2e6e-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.description: Full column sum of density\*cell thickness\*potential temperature. If the model is Boussinesq, then use Boussinesq reference density for the density factor.

baa4353e-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Potential Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Eddy Advection
baa4353e-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized  eddy advection (all forms of eddy advection). Reported only for models that use potential temperature as prognostic field.

baa43db8-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Potential Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Diffusion
baa43db8-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized mesoscale eddy diffusion. Reported only for models that use potential temperature as prognostic field.

baa441f0-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Potential Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Submesoscale Advection
baa441f0-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized submesoscale eddy advection. Reported only for models that use potential temperature as prognostic field.

1aaf7360-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Potential Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Residual Mean Advection
1aaf7360-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from residual mean (sum of Eulerian mean + parameterized eddy-induced) advection. Reported only for models that use potential temperature as prognostic field.

80ab740c-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Potential Temperature Expressed as Heat Content
80ab740c-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from all processes. Reported only for models that use potential temperature as prognostic field.

baa42c60-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Potential Temperature Expressed as Heat Content
baa42c60-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from all processes. Reported only for models that use potential temperature as prognostic field.

baa48caa-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Salinity Expressed as Salt Content Due to Parameterized Dianeutral Mixing
baa48caa-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of salt content for a grid cell from parameterized dianeutral mixing.

baa47bfc-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Salinity Expressed as Salt Content Due to Parameterized Eddy Advection
baa47bfc-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of salt content for a grid cell from parameterized eddy advection (any form of eddy advection).

baa4844e-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Salinity Expressed as Salt Content Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Diffusion
baa4844e-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of salt content for a grid cell from parameterized mesoscale eddy diffusion.

8b9e32d4-4a5b-11e6-9cd2-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Salinity Expressed as Salt Content Due to Parameterized Submesoscale Advection
8b9e32d4-4a5b-11e6-9cd2-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of salt content for a grid cell from parameterized submesoscale eddy advection.

baa4887c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Salinity Expressed as Salt Content Due to Parameterized Submesoscale Advection
baa4887c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of salt content for a grid cell from parameterized submesoscale eddy advection.

1aaffce0-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Salinity Expressed as Salt Content Due to Residual Mean Advection
1aaffce0-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of salt content for a grid cell from residual mean  (sum of Eulerian mean + parameterized eddy-induced)  advection.

baa47378-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Sea Water Salinity Expressed as Salt Content
baa47378-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of salt content for a grid cell from all processes.

baa4fb54-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Sea Water Pressure at Sea Floor
baa4fb54-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: "Sea water pressure" is the pressure that exists in the medium of sea water.  It includes the pressure due to overlying sea water, sea ice, air and any other medium that may be present.

80ab72a4-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.long_name: Integral wrt depth of sea water preformed salinity expressed as salt mass content
80ab72a4-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: This is a fundamental aspect of the changes in the hydrological cycle and their impact on the oceans, and due to new numerical schemes and vertical discretizations, it is important to calculate it consistently with the model formulation.

80ab72a1-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.long_name: Integral wrt depth of seawater potential temperature expressed as heat content
80ab72a1-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: This is the vertically-integrated heat content derived from potential temperature (thetao).

baa4ff96-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Sea Water Pressure at Sea Water Surface
baa4ff96-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: The phrase "sea water surface" means the upper boundary of the liquid portion of an ocean or sea, including the boundary to floating ice if present. "Sea water pressure" is the pressure that exists in the medium of sea water. It includes the pressure due to overlying sea water, sea ice, air and any other medium that may be present.

83bbfb73-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Downwelling Shortwave Radiation in Sea Water
83bbfb73-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: Downwelling Shortwave Radiation in Sea Water

1aaf5b6e-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.long_name: Net Rate of Absorption of Shortwave Energy in Ocean Layer
1aaf5b6e-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from penetrative shortwave radiation within a grid cell.

80ab7207-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.long_name: Surface Downwelling Shortwave Radiation over Ocean Not Covered by Sea Ice
80ab7207-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Surface Downwelling Shortwave Radiation over the portion of an ocean grid cell not covered by sea ice. Can be used for computation of surface albedo.

83bbfc64-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Net Downward Shortwave Radiation at Sea Water Surface
83bbfc64-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: The radiative flux into the surface of liquid sea water only. This excludes shortwave flux absorbed by sea ice, but includes any light that passes through the ice and is absorbed by the ocean.

80ab7208-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.long_name: Surface Upwelling Shortwave Radiation over Ocean Not Covered by Sea Ice
80ab7208-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Surface Upwelling Shortwave Radiation over the portion of an ocean grid cell not covered by sea ice. Can be used for computation of surface albedo.

80ab72a3-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.long_name: Integral wrt depth of sea water practical salinity expressed as salt mass content
80ab72a3-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: This is a fundamental aspect of the changes in the hydrological cycle and their impact on the oceans, and due to new numerical schemes and vertical discretizations, it is important to calculate it consistently with the model formulation.

80ab7426-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: The eastward component of the net drift velocity of ocean water caused by surface wind-sea waves. The Stokes drift velocity could be defined as the difference between the average Lagrangian flow velocity of a fluid parcel, and the average Eulerian flow velocity of the fluid at a fixed position.

80ab741b-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: The eastward component of the net drift velocity of ocean water caused by surface wind-sea waves. The Stokes drift velocity could be defined as the difference between the average Lagrangian flow velocity of a fluid parcel, and the average Eulerian flow velocity of the fluid at a fixed position.

80ab7427-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: The northward component of the net drift velocity of ocean water caused by surface wind-sea waves. The Stokes drift velocity could be defined as the difference between the average Lagrangian flow velocity of a fluid parcel, and the average Eulerian flow velocity of the fluid at a fixed position.

80ab7418-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: The northward component of the net drift velocity of ocean water caused by surface wind-sea waves. The Stokes drift velocity could be defined as the difference between the average Lagrangian flow velocity of a fluid parcel, and the average Eulerian flow velocity of the fluid at a fixed position.

ba9b2d36-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Mole Concentration of SF6 in Sea Water
ba9b2d36-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Mole concentration means number of moles per unit volume, also called "molarity", and is used in the construction "mole\_concentration\_of\_X\_in\_Y", where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as "nitrogen" or a phrase such as "nox\_expressed\_as\_nitrogen". The chemical formula of sulfur hexafluoride is SF6.

80ab7447-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.long_name: Ocean Salt Mass Transport across Lines
80ab7447-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Depth-integrated total salt mass transport from resolved and parameterized processes across different lines on the Earth's surface (based on appendix J and table J1 of Griffies et al., 2016). Formally, this means the integral along the line of the normal component of the heat transport. Positive and negative numbers refer to total northward/eastward and southward/westward transports, respectively. The transport should be evaluated for the full depth of the ocean, except for the Pacific Equatorial Undercurrent, which is averaged from the surface to 350m.

83bbfc63-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Downward Sea Ice Basal Salt Flux
83bbfc63-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: Basal salt flux into ocean from sea ice. This field is physical, and it arises since sea ice has a nonzero salt content, so it exchanges salt with the liquid ocean upon melting and freezing.

baa662fa-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Downward Sea Ice Basal Salt Flux
baa662fa-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: This field is physical, and it arises since sea ice has a nonzero salt content, so it exchanges salt with the liquid ocean upon melting and freezing.

baa66746-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Salt Flux into Sea Water from Rivers
baa66746-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: This field is physical, and it arises when rivers carry a nonzero salt content.  Often this is zero, with rivers assumed to be fresh.

baa3f2e0-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: This is the area fraction at the ocean surface.

527f5ccd-8c97-11ef-944e-41a8eb05f654.description: Contains all contributions to 'x-ward' salt mass transport from resolved and parameterized processes. Report on native horizontal grid.

80ab72a8-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Ocean salt mass x transport vertically integrated over the whole ocean depth. Contains all contributions to 'x-ward' salt mass transport from resolved and parameterized processes. Report on native horizontal grid.

527f5cce-8c97-11ef-944e-41a8eb05f654.description: Contains all contributions to 'y-ward' salt mass transport from resolved and parameterized processes. Report on native horizontal grid.

80ab72a9-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Ocean salt mass y transport vertically integrated over the whole ocean depth. Contains all contributions to 'y-ward' salt mass transport from resolved and parameterized processes. Report on native horizontal grid.

baa63136-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Water Flux into Sea Water Due to Sea Ice Thermodynamics
baa63136-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: computed as the sea ice thermodynamic water flux into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.

83bbfb4d-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: Northward Ocean Salt Transport from all physical processes affecting northward salt transport, resolved and parameterized. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.

baa5f7de-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Northward Ocean Salt Transport Due to Gyre
baa5f7de-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

baa5fc0c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Northward Ocean Salt Transport Due to Overturning
baa5fc0c-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

baa55086-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Sea water salinity is the salt content of sea water, often on the Practical Salinity Scale of 1978. However, the unqualified term 'salinity' is generic and does not necessarily imply any particular method of calculation. The units of salinity are dimensionless and the units attribute should normally be given as 1e-3 or 0.001 i.e. parts per thousand.

83bbfb71-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: Sea water salinity is the salt content of sea water, often on the Practical Salinity Scale of 1978. However, the unqualified term 'salinity' is generic and does not necessarily imply any particular method of calculation.

However, the unqualified term 'salinity' is generic and does not necessarily imply any particular method of calculation. baa55f4a-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Sea Water Salinity at Sea Floor
baa55f4a-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Model prognostic salinity at bottom-most model grid cell

1aaf4d2c-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.long_name: Depth Integral of Product of Sea Water Density and Prognostic Salinity
1aaf4d2c-b006-11e6-9289-ac72891c3257.description: Full column sum of density\*cell thickness\*salinity. If the model is Boussinesq, then use Boussinesq reference density for the density factor.

The units of salinity are dimensionless and the units attribute should normally be given as 1e-3 or 0.001 i.e. parts per thousand.

fdca5cc1-4d35-11e8-be0a-1c4d70487308.long_name: Isotopic Ratio of Oxygen-17 in Sea Water
fdca5cc1-4d35-11e8-be0a-1c4d70487308.description: Ratio of abundance of oxygen-17 (17O) atoms to oxygen-16 (16O) atoms in sea water

6f68c8f2-9acb-11e6-b7ee-ac72891c3257.long_name: Isotopic Ratio of Oxygen-18 in Sea Water
6f68c8f2-9acb-11e6-b7ee-ac72891c3257.description: Ratio of abundance of oxygen-18 (18O) atoms to oxygen-16 (16O) atoms in sea water

fdca5cc2-4d35-11e8-be0a-1c4d70487308.long_name: Isotopic Ratio of Deuterium in Sea Water
fdca5cc2-4d35-11e8-be0a-1c4d70487308.description: Ratio of abundance of hydrogen-2 (2H) atoms to hydrogen-1 (1H) atoms in sea water

80ab740d-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Average height of the highest one-third of waves present in the sea state, incorporating both wind-sea and swell waves. This is a key parameter for describing wave energy and is derived from the wave spectrum using spectral moments. Specifically, this parameter is four times the square root of the integral over all directions and all frequencies of the two-dimensional wave spectrum.

80ab744b-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Average height of the highest one-third of waves present in the sea state, incorporating both wind-sea and swell waves. This is a key parameter for describing wave energy and is derived from the wave spectrum using spectral moments. Specifically, this parameter is four times the square root of the integral over all directions and all frequencies of the two-dimensional wave spectrum.

80ab740e-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Highest value of the significant wave height simulated within a given time range (e.g., daily or monthly). The significant wave height (swh) is derived from the wave spectrum using spectral moments. Specifically, swh is four times the square root of the integral over all directions and all frequencies of the two-dimensional wave spectrum.

80ab7417-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Highest value of the significant wave height simulated within a given time range (e.g., daily or monthly). The significant wave height (swh) is derived from the wave spectrum using spectral moments. Specifically, swh is four times the square root of the integral over all directions and all frequencies of the two-dimensional wave spectrum.

80ab741d-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Average height of the highest one-third of waves present in the sea state, incorporating just swell waves (i.e., waves that have propagated away from their generation area). This parameter is derived from all swell partitions of the wave spectrum using spectral moments. Specifically, this parameter is four times the square root of the integral over all directions and all frequencies of the components of the two-dimensional wave spectrum that are not under the influence of local wind.

80ab7429-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Average height of the highest one-third of waves present in the sea state, incorporating just swell waves (i.e., waves that have propagated away from their generation area). This parameter is derived from all swell partitions of the wave spectrum using spectral moments. Specifically, this parameter is four times the square root of the integral over all directions and all frequencies of the components of the two-dimensional wave spectrum that are not under the influence of local wind.

80ab741e-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Average height of the highest one-third of waves present in the sea state, incorporating just wind-sea waves (i.e., local wind waves). It is derived from the wind-sea wave spectrum using spectral moments. Specifically, this parameter is four times the square root of the integral over all directions and all frequencies of the two-dimensional wind-sea wave spectrum.

80ab7428-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Average height of the highest one-third of waves present in the sea state, incorporating just wind-sea waves (i.e., local wind waves). It is derived from the wind-sea wave spectrum using spectral moments. Specifically, this parameter is four times the square root of the integral over all directions and all frequencies of the two-dimensional wind-sea wave spectrum.

83bbfc62-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Sea Water Surface Downward X Stress
83bbfc62-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: The stress on the liquid ocean from interactions with overlying atmosphere, sea ice, ice shelf, etc.

ac26fd4c-bb0d-11e6-83c8-bf7187cdbd68.long_name: Sea Water Surface Downward X Stress
ac26fd4c-bb0d-11e6-83c8-bf7187cdbd68.description: This is the stress on the liquid ocean from overlying atmosphere, sea ice, ice shelf, etc.

baa6cf38-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Sea Water Surface Downward X Stress
baa6cf38-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: This is the stress on the liquid ocean from overlying atmosphere, sea ice, ice shelf, etc.

83bbfc61-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Sea Water Surface Downward Y Stress
83bbfc61-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: The stress on the liquid ocean from interactions with overlying atmosphere, sea ice, ice shelf, etc.

ac270e9a-bb0d-11e6-83c8-bf7187cdbd68.long_name: Sea Water Surface Downward Y Stress
ac270e9a-bb0d-11e6-83c8-bf7187cdbd68.description: This is the stress on the liquid ocean from overlying atmosphere, sea ice, ice shelf, etc.

baa6d366-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Sea Water Surface Downward Y Stress
baa6d366-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: This is the stress on the liquid ocean from overlying atmosphere, sea ice, ice shelf, etc.

8b924fa0-4a5b-11e6-9cd2-ac72891c3257.long_name: Depth Average Potential Temperature of Upper 2000m

8b92450a-4a5b-11e6-9cd2-ac72891c3257.long_name: Depth Average Potential Temperature of Upper 300m

8b924a46-4a5b-11e6-9cd2-ac72891c3257.long_name: Depth Average Potential Temperature of Upper 700m

baa52138-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Global Average Sea Water Potential Temperature
baa52138-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Diagnostic should be contributed even for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field

479522ca-bb0b-11e6-8316-5980f7b176d1.description: Diagnostic should be contributed even for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.

80ac31e3-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: Diagnostic should be contributed even for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.

baa51d00-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Diagnostic should be contributed even for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.

83bbfb6e-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: Diagnostic should be contributed even for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.

6f69f1b4-9acb-11e6-b7ee-ac72891c3257.long_name: Vertically Averaged Sea Water Potential Temperature

479514a6-bb0b-11e6-8316-5980f7b176d1.description: The time varying thickness of ocean cells. "Thickness" means the vertical extent of a layer. "Cell" refers to a model grid-cell.

baa518c8-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: The time varying thickness of ocean cells. "Thickness" means the vertical extent of a layer. "Cell" refers to a model grid-cell.

bab9bd00-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Thickness of ocean cells. "Thickness" means the vertical extent of a layer. "Cell" refers to a model grid-cell.

83bbfb4c-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Ocean Model Cell Thickness at u-points
83bbfb4c-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: The time varying thickness of ocean cells centered at u-points (points for velocity in the x-direction). "Thickness" means the vertical extent of a layer. "Cell" refers to a model grid-cell.

83bbfb4b-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.long_name: Ocean Model Cell Thickness at v-points
83bbfb4b-7f07-11ef-9308-b1dd71e64bec.description: The time varying thickness of ocean cells centered at v-points (points for velocity in the y-direction). "Thickness" means the vertical extent of a layer. "Cell" refers to a model grid-cell.

baa4e07e-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Ocean Eddy Kinetic Energy Content Due to Parameterized Eddy Advection
baa4e07e-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Depth integrated impacts on kinetic energy arising from parameterized eddy-induced advection. For CMIP5, this diagnostic was 3d, whereas the CMIP6 depth integrated diagnostic is sufficient for many purposes and reduces archive requirements.

baa4b4e6-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Tendency of Ocean Potential Energy Content
baa4b4e6-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Rate that work is done against vertical stratification, as measured by the vertical heat and salt diffusivity. Report here as depth integrated two-dimensional field.

baa53218-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.long_name: Sea Water Potential Temperature at Sea Floor
baa53218-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: Potential temperature at the ocean bottom-most grid cell.

baa53ace-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: This may differ from "surface temperature" in regions of sea ice or floating ice shelves. For models using conservative temperature as the prognostic field, they should report the top ocean layer as surface potential temperature, which is the same as surface in situ temperature.

baa720e6-e5dd-11e5-8482-ac72891c3257.description: This may differ from "surface temperature" in regions of sea ice or floating ice shelves. For models using conservative temperature as the prognostic field, they should report the top ocean layer as surface potential temperature, which is the same as surface in situ temperature.

80ac31e4-a698-11ef-914a-613c0433d878.description: This may differ from "surface temperature" in regions of sea ice or floating ice shelves.
